remarks: The order of a multiple divides the order of the base point. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odmulgid.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odmulgid.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odmulgid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odmulg2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( O ` ( N .x. A ) ) || ( O ` A ) ) $.
